rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%}
Any 3 (I/W) co-req units in {AZA2015, AZA2490, AZA2495}
Any 3 (I/W) co-req units in {AZA2015, AZA2490, AZA2495}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {AZA1019, AZA1020}

description: The unit expands the study of topics in the field of child and adult development already encountered in the first year. It focuses on cognitive, social-emotional and physical changes in human development and how these are shaped by macrosystems such as culture, and microsystems such as peers and the family. The African cultural context will be emphasized. The laboratory programme complements the lectures, and provides further training in report writing, oral presentations and teamwork.
